mapper.insert: insert into subject (id, user_id, `name`, description, img_url, sort, author, create_time, update_time, `status`) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update subject set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, `name`, description, img_url, sort, author, create_time, update_time, `status` from subject where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, user_id, `name`, description, img_url, sort, author, create_time, update_time, `status` from subject
